movies.title: Gangs Of Wasseypur (Part 1)
movies.shortDescription: Sardar sets out to avenge his father who was murdered by Ramadhir Singh, a cunning politician and mining kingpin. In the ensuing war, many unresolved family feuds erupt creating unrest.
movies.longDescription: Sardar sets out to avenge his father who was murdered by Ramadhir Singh, a cunning politician and mining kingpin. In the ensuing war, many unresolved family feuds erupt creating unrest.

series.title: Roku 2020 Developer Summit
series.shortDescription: Roku held their annual Developer Summit online on October 13, 2020. Topics covered included the Fall 2020 product lineup, new features in Roku OS 9.4, and channel certification updates.

episodes.title: Roku 2020 Developer Summit: Introduction
episodes.shortDescription: The Roku Developer Relations team welcomes Roku developers to the 2020 Developer Summit.
episodes.longDescription: The Roku Developer Relations team welcomes Roku developers to the 2020 Developer Summit.
